message: Can I order 2 margherita and 2 pepperoni pizzas

Great! I found Margherita (AED 31.0 each) and Pepperoni (AED 43.0 each) on our menu. Would you like to place an order for these items? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel. Additionally, I will need a few more details: your NYU ID (exactly 8 digits), building (either A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, or A6C) and your phone number to complete the order.
